expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendorByIdentifier
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation vendor synced record based on the provided ids.

data.sail_code:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(value: ri!vendorId),
  recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD(),
  rule!AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier(
    recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
    identifier: ri!vendorId,
    executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
    triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
    fields: ri!fields,
    relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
  )
)
data.definition:
if(
  rule!AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty(value: ri!vendorId),

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
expression_rules.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

test_cases.test_name: EXCEPTION: It is not possible to have a test case with assertion for this rule

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_checkIsNullOrEmpty
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is null/empty. Returns True or False.

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_returnDecisionLabelForViewActions
expression_rules.description: The rule is used to return the decision labels for the actions that display the decision infomation from the vendors tab in the summary

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!decisionId),
    cons!AS_GSS_CO_NULL_REPLACEABLE_TEXT,
    a!match(
      value: ri!decisionId,
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_VENDOR_DECISION_SELECT,
      then: "Selected",
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_VENDOR_DECISION_REJECT,
      then: "Rejected",
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_VENDOR_DECISION_NOT_REVIEWED,
      then: "Not Reviewed",
      default: cons!AS_GSS_CO_NULL_REPLACEABLE_TEXT
    )
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!decisionId),
    cons!AS_GSS_CO_NULL_REPLACEABLE_TEXT,
    a!match(
      value: ri!decisionId,
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_VENDOR_DECISION_SELECT,
      then: "Selected",
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_VENDOR_DECISION_REJECT,
      then: "Rejected",
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_VENDOR_DECISION_NOT_REVIEWED,
      then: "Not Reviewed",
      default: cons!AS_GSS_CO_NULL_REPLACEABLE_TEXT
    )
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_cast
expression_rules.description: Casts a variable to the type of either the input `type`, or the typeof of the input `typeof`, and properly handles for null inputs

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_BrandingValueByKey
expression_rules.description: Returns a GSS branding value by key

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute record queries with minimal overhead

data.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set.

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/
data.definition:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId],
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Ref Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_linkField"(
        links: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
            label: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId],
            recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD,
            identifier: fv!identifier
          )
        }
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,

      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1,
      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine1]

      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorAddressLine2,

      value: if(
      isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
      fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime],
      datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(

      value: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.completedTaskCount],
      align: "START"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

expressions.TITLE: "Update"

record_types.name: AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: Synced record for pricing line item information for Vendors

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Item Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Evaluation Vendor",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationVendor.legalName,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationVendor.legalName], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Item Description",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemDescription,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.itemDescription], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Unit Price",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.unitPrice,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.unitPrice]),
        "",
        fixed(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.unitPrice], 2)
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Quantity",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.quantity,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.quantity]),
        "",
        fixed(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.quantity], 2)
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Amount",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.amount,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.amount]),
        "",
        fixed(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.amount], 2)
      ),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Sort Order",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.sortOrder,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.sortOrder], ""),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]),
        "",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Source Application",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplication.refLabel,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplication.refLabel], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Extraction Type",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.extractionType.refLabel,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.extractionType.refLabel], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
        "",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy], "")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
        "",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_VendorPriceBreakup_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)
